document_data.name: Renee
document_data.mainbody:
'''Renee''' was a resident of [[Shadowdale]] who worked as a server at the [[Old Skull Inn]] for a time during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|She must have smelled the gold on you.|[[Jhaele Silvermane]], to an adventurer about Renee.}}
document_data.Description: She had elegant and alluring features, with piercing blue eyes and wild, curly-red hair that was reminiscent of [[Sune]] herself.
document_data.Activities: Renee spent some of her time cozying up to and flirting with wealthy individuals at the Old Skull.
document_data.History: Just prior to the [[Second battle of Shadowdale]], in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, Renee met and startled flirting with [[Adon]], who was too troubled by his own scarred face to accept her advances.
